name: AJEnglish
text:
What is albinism?  https://t.co/yRqRdGjBmr

Albinism is a congenital disorder resulting in a lack of pigmentation (known as melanin) that gives colour to hair, skin & eyes. Conditions associated with albinism include vulnerability to bright light #AlbinismDay. https://t.co/mBYcMxGKes

name: AJEnglish
text:
What is albinism? https://t.co/oGUSUNK7eZ

Albinism is a congenital disorder resulting in a lack of pigmentation (known as melanin) that gives colour to hair, skin & eyes. Conditions associated with albinism include vulnerability to bright light #AlbinismDay. https://t.co/p9PrTwyrYY

name: AJEnglish
text:
What causes albinism? https://t.co/yRqRdGjBmr | #AlbinismDay

Albinism is caused by a recessive gene, meaning both parents must carry the gene for it to be passed on. The parents themselves do not need to exhibit albinism. https://t.co/6npUHMUmBt
